revised_title: Hydration Mechanism of Tricalcium Aluminate in Cement: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This article investigates the hydration process of tricalcium aluminate in the presence of gypsum, a key component in cement. The authors propose a model for the hydration process, identifying different phases and their solubility. They also discuss the role of tricalcium aluminate hydration in the overall cement chemistry and its implications for cement technology.
